channel.title: Court Wizard is more powerful than people think and needs to be made Unique
channel.description: Just had a game as Mastermind where my first **-> 5 <-** conversion attempts failed with one Court Wizard & two Neutrals already dead.. That's beyond ridiculous. Of course some of those attempts were probably on a Priest or Prince but still... I believe anti-conversion mechanics are too strong right now.

item.title: Court Wizard is more powerful than people think and needs to be made Unique
item.dc:creator: WutangRZA
item.description:
I don’t think CW is too strong. I think the number of convert immune targets in a game is too strong. Maybe instead of guaranteed priest, like 20% higher chance of priest spawn or something. It’s just too good to have a priest which is night immune and convert immune, a prince which is convert immune, and a res target which can’t be voted up or converted along with a plethora of alchs that can’t be converted.
